alert.note: Alert for Smyth; Tazewell (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 27 at 8:36PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...Flood Advisory Now In Effect for Smyth and Tazewell Counties until 945 PM EDT This Evening... ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall from showers and thunderstorms is expected. * WHERE...A portion of southwest Virginia, including the following counties, Smyth and Tazewell. * WHEN...Until 945 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Some low-water crossings may become impassable. Small creeks and streams could experience sharp rises during the next few hours. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 833 PM EDT, Rainfall within the advisory area has decreased. Thus, the flooding threat has been reduced. However, from 1 to 3 inches of rain fell in parts of the advisory area during the past several hours and flooding of low-lying and poor drainage areas remains possible for a while longer. - This includes the following streams and drainages... Beaver Creek, Beech Fork, Bluestone River, Blue Spring Creek, Clinch River, Campbell Creek, Big Creek and Burkes Garden Creek. Additional rainfall amounts should be less than one inch. - Some locations that could experience flooding include... Marion... Richlands... Bluefield... Tazewell... Saltville... Chilhowie... Cedar Bluff... - For additional information on stream, creek, river, and lake levels please go to our web site located at: http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood.
info.instruction: In hilly terrain there are hundreds of low water crossings which are potentially dangerous in heavy rain. Do not attempt to cross flooded roads. Find an alternate route. When it is safe to do so, please send your reports of flooding, including mudslides or flooded roads, to the National Weather Service by calling toll free at 1...8 6 6...2 1 5...4 3 2 4. Reports and pictures can also be shared on the National Weather Service Blacksburg Facebook page and on Twitter.
